lyricLines.description: The opening lines about extremely rare meetings

cards.back:
[sound:wan_nian_yi_ci_de_xiang_yu.mp3]

(wànnián yīcì de xiāngyù)

A meeting that happens once in ten thousand years

cards.translation: A meeting that happens once in ten thousand years

cards.back:
[sound:qian_nian_yi_hui_de_xiang_ai.mp3]

(qiānnián yīhuí de xiāng'ài)

cards.translation: A love that happens once in a thousand years
